original_title: Sri Lanka state run CPC cuts kerosene prices
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s state-run Ceylon Petroleum Corporation (CPC) reduced price of kerosene by 14.1 percent or 50 rupees to 305 rupees with effect from Wednesday midnight.
The price of Kerosene was at 355 rupees a litre and was last revised on January 02, 2022.
The price of Industrial Kerosene that was at 464 rupees has been reduced by 28.8 percent to 330 rupees.
Prices of Auto diesel price, Super diesel, petrol 95 Octane and 92 Octane remained unchanged. (Colombo/March 01/2023)
